alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 18 at 5:41PM MST until August 18 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 11 PM MST SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The Coconino Plateau and the Western Mogollon Rim. * WHEN...Through 11 PM MST Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Flash flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, swimming holes and over recently burned areas. Low-water crossings could also experience flash flooding, which would create deadly travel conditions. Consider changing your plans if you were going to hike, boat, or paddleboard to a slot canyon or normally dry wash. If you do still decide to recreate, check in at a nearby visitor center or ranger station. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
